title: Hello, Rust!
description:
Welcome to Rust! Rust is a fast, safe systems programming language.
In this course, you will be working for the fictional os company, **_Oxideworks labs_ on their new project, _Verdigris OS_**.
You will understand the code below soon, but for now, complete the assignemnt

### Assignment:
Replace the text in the println! macro with "Hello, Welcome to Verdigris!"
